verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> again to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to the prince <S%H5057><s%> of Tyrus, <S%H6865><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> is lifted <S%H1361><s%> up, and you have said, <S%H559><s%> I am a God, <S%H410><s%> I sit <S%H3427><s%> in the seat <S%H4186><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> in the middle <S%H3820><s%> of the seas; <S%H3220><s%> yet you are a man, <S%H120><s%> and not God, <S%H410><s%> though you set <S%H5414><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> as the heart <S%H3820><s%> of God: <S%H430><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> you are wiser <S%H2450><s%> than Daniel; <S%H1840><s%> there is no <S%H3808><s%> secret <S%H5640><s%> that they can hide <S%H6004><s%> from you:

With your wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and with your understanding <S%H8394><s%> you have gotten <S%H6213><s%> you riches, <S%H2428><s%> and have gotten <S%H6213><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%> into your treasures: <S%H214><s%>

By your great <S%H7230><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and by your traffic <S%H7404><s%> have you increased <S%H7235><s%> your riches, <S%H2428><s%> and your heart <S%H3824><s%> is lifted <S%H1361><s%> up because of your riches: <S%H2428><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> you have set <S%H5414><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> as the heart <S%H3820><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> on you, the terrible <S%H6184><s%> of the nations: <S%H1471><s%> and they shall draw <S%H7324><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the beauty <S%H3308><s%> of your wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and they shall defile <S%H2490><s%> your brightness. <S%H3314><s%>

They shall bring <S%H3381><s%> you down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit, <S%H7845><s%> and you shall die <S%H4191><s%> the deaths <S%H4463><s%> of them that are slain <S%H2491><s%> in the middle <S%H3820><s%> of the seas. <S%H3220><s%>

Will you yet <S%H559><s%> say <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him that slays <S%H2026><s%> you, I am God? <S%H430><s%> but you shall be a man, <S%H120><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of him that slays <S%H2490><s%> you.

You shall die <S%H4191><s%> the deaths <S%H4194><s%> of the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of strangers: <S%H2114><s%> for I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> take <S%H5375><s%> up a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> on the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyrus, <S%H6865><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> You seal <S%H2856><s%> up the sum, <S%H8508><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and perfect <S%H3632><s%> in beauty. <S%H3308><s%>

You have been <S%H1961><s%> in Eden <S%H5731><s%> the garden <S%H1588><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> precious <S%H3368><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> was your covering, <S%H4540><s%> the sardius, <S%H124><s%> topaz, <S%H6357><s%> and the diamond, <S%H3095><s%> the beryl, <S%H8658><s%> the onyx, <S%H7718><s%> and the jasper, <S%H3471><s%> the sapphire, <S%H5601><s%> the emerald, <S%H5306><s%> and the carbuncle, <S%H1304><s%> and gold: <S%H2091><s%> the workmanship <S%H4399><s%> of your tabrets <S%H8596><s%> and of your pipes <S%H5345><s%> was prepared <S%H3559><s%> in you in the day <S%H3117><s%> that you were created. <S%H1254><s%>

You are the anointed <S%H4473><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> that covers; <S%H5526><s%> and I have set <S%H5414><s%> you so: you were <S%H1961><s%> on the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> you have walked <S%H1980><s%> up and down in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the stones <S%H68><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>
You were perfect <S%H8549><s%> in your ways <S%H1870><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> that you were created, <S%H1254><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%> was found <S%H4672><s%> in you.

By the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your merchandise <S%H7404><s%> they have filled <S%H4390><s%> the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you with violence, <S%H2555><s%> and you have sinned: <S%H2398><s%> therefore I will cast <S%H2490><s%> you as profane <S%H2490><s%> out of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God: <S%H430><s%> and I will destroy <S%H6><s%> you, O covering <S%H5526><s%> cherub, <S%H3742><s%> from the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the stones <S%H68><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>

Your heart <S%H3820><s%> was lifted <S%H1361><s%> up because of your beauty, <S%H3308><s%> you have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> your wisdom <S%H2451><s%> by reason <S%H5921><s%> of your brightness: <S%H3314><s%> I will cast <S%H7993><s%> you to the ground, <S%H776><s%> I will lay <S%H5414><s%> you before <S%H6440><s%> kings, <S%H4428><s%> that they may behold <S%H7200><s%> you.

You have defiled <S%H2490><s%> your sanctuaries <S%H4720><s%> by the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> by the iniquity <S%H5766><s%> of your traffic; <S%H7404><s%> therefore will I bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> from the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you, it shall devour <S%H398><s%> you, and I will bring <S%H5414><s%> you to ashes <S%H665><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> them that behold <S%H7200><s%> you.

All <S%H3605><s%> they that know <S%H3045><s%> you among the people <S%H5971><s%> shall be astonished <S%H8074><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> you: you shall be a terror, <S%H1091><s%> and never <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> shall you be any more.
Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Zidon, <S%H6721><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it,

And say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I am against <S%H5921><s%> you, O Zidon; <S%H6721><s%> and I will be glorified <S%H3513><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you: and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when I shall have executed <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> in her, and shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in her.

For I will send <S%H7971><s%> into her pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> and blood <S%H1818><s%> into her streets; <S%H2351><s%> and the wounded <S%H2491><s%> shall be judged <S%H5307><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of her by the sword <S%H2719><s%> on her on every <S%H5437><s%> side; <S%H5439><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And there shall be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> a pricking <S%H3992><s%> brier <S%H5544><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> nor any grieving <S%H3510><s%> thorn <S%H6975><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that are round <S%H5439><s%> about them, that despised <S%H7590><s%> them; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> When I shall have gathered <S%H6908><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the people <S%H5971><s%> among whom <S%H834><s%> they are scattered, <S%H6327><s%> and shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in them in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> then shall they dwell <S%H3427><s%> in their land <S%H127><s%> that I have given <S%H5414><s%> to my servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

And they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> safely <S%H983><s%> therein, <S%H5921><s%> and shall build <S%H1129><s%> houses, <S%H1004><s%> and plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards; <S%H3754><s%> yes, they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> with confidence, <S%H983><s%> when I have executed <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> those that despise <S%H7590><s%> them round <S%H5439><s%> about them; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>
